verses.verse: And <WG2532> when<WG3753> they came nigh<WG1448> to<WG1519> Jerusalem,<WG2419> unto<WG1519> Bethphage<WG967> and<WG2532> Bethany,<WG963> at<WG4314> the<WG3588> mount<WG3735> of Olives,<WG1636> he sendeth forth<WG649> two<WG1417> of his<WG848> disciples,<WG3101>

And <WG2532> saith<WG3004> unto them,<WG846> Go your way<WG5217> into<WG1519> the<WG3588> village<WG2968> over against<WG2713> you: <WG5216> and<WG2532> as soon as<WG2112> ye be entered<WG1531> into<WG1519> it,<WG846> ye shall find<WG2147> a colt<WG4454> tied,<WG1210> whereon <WG1909> <WG3739> never <WG3762> man<WG444> sat;<WG2523> loose<WG3089> him,<WG846> and bring<WG71> him.

And <WG2532> if<WG1437> any man<WG5100> say<WG2036> unto you,<WG5213> Why<WG5101> do<WG4160> ye this?<WG5124> say<WG2036> ye that<WG3754> the<WG3588> Lord<WG2962> hath<WG2192> need<WG5532> of him;<WG846> and<WG2532> straightway<WG2112> he will send<WG649> him<WG846> hither. <WG5602>

And <WG1161> they went their way,<WG565> and<WG2532> found<WG2147> the<WG3588> colt<WG4454> tied<WG1210> by<WG4314> the<WG3588> door<WG2374> without<WG1854> in<WG1909> a place where two ways met;<WG296> and<WG2532> they loose<WG3089> him.<WG846>
And <WG2532> certain<WG5100> of them that stood<WG2476> there<WG1563> said<WG3004> unto them,<WG846> What<WG5101> do<WG4160> ye, loosing<WG3089> the<WG3588> colt?<WG4454>
And <WG1161> they<WG3588> said<WG2036> unto them<WG846> even as<WG2531> Jesus<WG2424> had commanded:<WG1781> and<WG2532> they let them go.<WG863> <WG846>

And <WG2532> they brought<WG71> the<WG3588> colt<WG4454> to<WG4314> Jesus,<WG2424> and<WG2532> cast<WG1911> their<WG848> garments<WG2440> on him;<WG846> and<WG2532> he sat<WG2523> upon<WG1909> him.<WG846>

And <WG1161> many<WG4183> spread<WG4766> their<WG848> garments<WG2440> in<WG1519> the<WG3588> way:<WG3598> and<WG1161> others<WG243> cut down<WG2875> branches<WG4746> off<WG1537> the<WG3588> trees,<WG1186> and<WG2532> strewed<WG4766> them in<WG1519> the<WG3588> way.<WG3598>

And <WG2532> they that went before,<WG4254> and<WG2532> they that followed,<WG190> cried,<WG2896> saying,<WG3004> Hosanna;<WG5614> Blessed<WG2127> is he that cometh<WG2064> in<WG1722> the name<WG3686> of the Lord: <WG2962>

Blessed <WG2127> be the<WG3588> kingdom<WG932> of our<WG2257> father<WG3962> David,<WG1138> that cometh<WG2064> in<WG1722> the name<WG3686> of the Lord:<WG2962> Hosanna<WG5614> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> highest.<WG5310>

And <WG2532> Jesus<WG2424> entered<WG1525> into<WG1519> Jerusalem,<WG2414> and<WG2532> into<WG1519> the<WG3588> temple:<WG2411> and<WG2532> when he had looked round about<WG4017> upon all things,<WG3956> and<WG2532> now<WG2235> the<WG3588> eventide<WG5610> was come,<WG5607> <WG3798> he went out<WG1831> unto<WG1519> Bethany<WG963> with<WG3326> the<WG3588> twelve.<WG1427>
And <WG2532> on the<WG3588> morrow,<WG1887> when they<WG846> were come<WG1831> from<WG575> Bethany,<WG963> he was hungry: <WG3983>

And <WG2532> seeing<WG1492> a fig tree<WG4808> afar off<WG3113> having<WG2192> leaves,<WG5444> he came,<WG2064> if<WG1487> haply<WG686> he might find<WG2147> anything<WG5100> thereon:<WG1722> <WG846> and<WG2532> when he came<WG2064> to<WG1909> it, he<WG846> found<WG2147> nothing<WG3762> but<WG1508> leaves;<WG5444> for<WG1063> the time<WG2540> of figs<WG4810> was<WG2258> not<WG3756> yet.

And <WG2532> Jesus<WG2424> answered<WG611> and said<WG2036> unto it,<WG846> No man<WG3367> eat<WG5315> fruit<WG2590> of<WG1537> thee<WG4675> hereafter<WG3371> forever. <WG1519> <WG165> And<WG2532> his<WG846> disciples<WG3101> heard<WG191> it.

And <WG2532> they come<WG2064> to<WG1519> Jerusalem:<WG2414> and<WG2532> Jesus<WG2424> went<WG1525> into<WG1519> the<WG3588> temple,<WG2411> and began<WG756> to cast out<WG1544> them that sold<WG4453> and<WG2532> bought<WG59> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> temple,<WG2411> and<WG2532> overthrew<WG2690> the<WG3588> tables<WG5132> of the<WG3588> moneychangers,<WG2855> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> seats<WG2515> of them that sold<WG4453> doves;<WG4058>
And <WG2532> would not<WG3756> suffer<WG863> that<WG2443> any man<WG5100> should carry<WG1308> any vessel<WG4632> through<WG1223> the<WG3588> temple.<WG2411>

And <WG2532> he taught,<WG1321> saying<WG3004> unto them,<WG846> Is it not<WG3756> written,<WG1125> My<WG3450> house<WG3624> shall be called<WG2564> of all<WG3956> nations<WG1484> the house<WG3624> of prayer?<WG4335> but<WG1161> ye<WG5210> have made<WG4160> it<WG846> a den<WG4693> of thieves. <WG3027>

And <WG2532> the<WG3588> scribes<WG1122> and<WG2532> chief priests<WG749> heard<WG191> it, and<WG2532> sought<WG2212> how<WG4459> they might destroy<WG622> him:<WG846> for<WG1063> they feared<WG5399> him,<WG846> because<WG3754> all<WG3956> the<WG3588> people<WG3793> was astonished<WG1605> at<WG1909> his<WG846> doctrine.<WG1322>
And <WG2532> when<WG3753> even<WG3796> was come,<WG1096> he went<WG1607> out<WG1854> of the<WG3588> city.<WG4172>
And <WG2532> in the morning,<WG4404> as they passed by,<WG3899> they saw<WG1492> the<WG3588> fig tree<WG4808> dried up<WG3583> from<WG1537> the roots.<WG4491>

And <WG2532> Peter<WG4074> calling to remembrance<WG363> saith<WG3004> unto him,<WG846> Master,<WG4461> behold,<WG2396> the<WG3588> fig tree<WG4808> which<WG3739> thou cursedst<WG2672> is withered away.<WG3583>
And <WG2532> Jesus<WG2424> answering<WG611> saith<WG3004> unto them,<WG846> Have <WG2192> faith<WG4102> in God. <WG2316>

For <WG1063> verily<WG281> I say<WG3004> unto you,<WG5213> That<WG3754> whosoever <WG3739> <WG302> shall say<WG2036> unto this<WG5129> mountain,<WG3735> Be thou removed,<WG142> and<WG2532> be thou cast<WG906> into<WG1519> the<WG3588> sea;<WG2281> and<WG2532> shall not<WG3361> doubt<WG1252> in<WG1722> his<WG848> heart,<WG2588> but<WG235> shall believe<WG4100> that<WG3754> those things which<WG3739> he saith<WG3004> shall come to pass;<WG1096> he<WG846> shall have<WG2071> whatsoever <WG3739> <WG1437> he saith. <WG2036>

Therefore <WG1223> <WG5124> I say<WG3004> unto you,<WG5213> What things soever <WG3956> <WG3745> <WG302> ye desire,<WG154> when ye pray,<WG4336> believe<WG4100> that<WG3754> ye receive<WG2983> them, and<WG2532> ye<WG5213> shall have<WG2071> them.

And <WG2532> when<WG3752> ye stand<WG4739> praying,<WG4336> forgive,<WG863> if<WG1487> ye have<WG2192> aught<WG5100> against<WG2596> any: <WG5100> that<WG2443> your<WG5216> Father<WG3962> also<WG2532> which<WG3588> is in<WG1722> heaven<WG3772> may forgive<WG863> you<WG5213> your<WG5216> trespasses. <WG3900>

But <WG1161> if<WG1487> ye<WG5210> do not<WG3756> forgive,<WG863> neither<WG3761> will your<WG5216> Father<WG3962> which<WG3588> is in<WG1722> heaven<WG3772> forgive<WG863> your<WG5216> trespasses. <WG3900>

And <WG2532> they come<WG2064> again<WG3825> to<WG1519> Jerusalem:<WG2414> and<WG2532> as he<WG846> was walking<WG4043> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> temple,<WG2411> there come<WG2064> to<WG4314> him<WG846> the<WG3588> chief priests,<WG749> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> scribes,<WG1122> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> elders,<WG4245>

And <WG2532> say<WG3004> unto him,<WG846> By<WG1722> what<WG4169> authority<WG1849> doest<WG4160> thou these things?<WG5023> and<WG2532> who<WG5101> gave<WG1325> thee<WG4671> this<WG5026> authority<WG1849> to<WG2443> do<WG4160> these things?<WG5023>

And <WG1161> Jesus<WG2424> answered<WG611> and said<WG2036> unto them,<WG846> I will also ask <WG2504> <WG1905> of you<WG5209> one<WG1520> question,<WG3056> and<WG2532> answer<WG611> me,<WG3427> and<WG2532> I will tell<WG2046> you<WG5213> by<WG1722> what<WG4169> authority<WG1849> I do<WG4160> these things. <WG5023>
The <WG3588> baptism<WG908> of John,<WG2491> was<WG2258> it from<WG1537> heaven,<WG3772> or<WG2228> of<WG1537> men?<WG444> answer<WG611> me. <WG3427>

And <WG2532> they reasoned<WG3049> with<WG4314> themselves,<WG1438> saying,<WG3004> If<WG1437> we shall say,<WG2036> From<WG1537> heaven;<WG3772> he will say,<WG2046> Why<WG1302> then<WG3767> did ye not<WG3756> believe<WG4100> him?<WG846>

But <WG235> if<WG1437> we shall say,<WG2036> Of<WG1537> men;<WG444> they feared<WG5399> the<WG3588> people:<WG2992> for<WG1063> all<WG537> men counted<WG2192> John,<WG2491> that<WG3754> he was<WG2258> a prophet<WG4396> indeed.<WG3689>

And <WG2532> they answered<WG611> and said<WG3004> unto Jesus.<WG2424> We cannot tell.<WG1492> <WG3756> And<WG2532> Jesus<WG2424> answering<WG611> saith<WG3004> unto them,<WG846> Neither <WG3761> do I<WG1473> tell<WG3004> you<WG5213> by<WG1722> what<WG4169> authority<WG1849> I do<WG4160> these things. <WG5023>
